Business Domains

Systematic trading

We can help with all the stages of systematic trading, from data gathering and cleaning to execution system and performance evaluation.

Risk management

Interfacing with position keeping and portfolio management tools, we can develop personalised stress tests and scenario matrices, with cloud-based concurrent evaluation and advanced visualisation options.

Derivative pricing

Scala implementation of advanced numerical methods for derivative pricing.

Experience with high-performance equity volatility derivatives evaluation on AWS.
